cause.description:
The culprits 1. Michael Bay 2. Roland Emmerich 3. Brett Ratner 4. Barry Sonnenfeld 5. Sam Raimi 6. Sylvester Stallone 7. Chris Columbus more to come... NEW NEW 8. Keenen Ivory Wayans 9. Wolfgang Petersen
1. We need to stop these directors at once.
2. Stop seeing these movie at once. we're just encouraging them
3. Write your stat senators about this culturally crippling problem
cause.mission: Stop bad filmmakers from making bad films.
cause.name: Bad filmmakers need to stop.
